# `bbva-date`

## `bbva-date`

####   `Semantic Dom`

```html
12/17/1995

```

##   `Semantic Dom`

####     `DOM - Structure test`

```html
<bbva-date
  date="December 17, 1995"
  locale="en-US"
>
</bbva-date>

```

####     `SHADOW DOM - Structure test`

```html
December 17, 1995

```

####     `LIGHT DOM - Structure test`

```html

```

## `bbva-date empty date object`

####     `DOM - Structure test`

```html
<bbva-date
  date=""
  locale="en-US"
>
</bbva-date>

```

